'''Starsail Coin''' is a reward obtained from the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|text1    = Take part in "Mosaic of Moments" to obtain Starsail Coins that can be used in Figurine Fabrication to create all sorts of Figurines.<br>After you have used enough Fabrication chances, you can even obtain materials as rewards.
|image1   = Tutorial Fabricating.png
}}
